title: WTB:  TX SL's:  M. Miller, T. Thebo, F. White, J. Bastain, D. Stark
author: joebrandon1977

posts.post_title: WTB:  TX SL's:  M. Miller, T. Thebo, F. White, J. Bastain, D. Stark
posts.post_content:
Being from Texas, I've decided I wanted to add the T206 Texas players to my collection.

I'd prefer the OM back, but will consider others for a nice card.

You can email me at [url]joe_hardin@sbcglobal.net[/url] with scans / pricing.

1909-11 T206 - Dallas (Southern League)  
 Miller, Molly 

1909-11 T206 - Houston (Southern League)  
 White, Foley 

1909-11 T206 - San Antonio(Southern League)  
 Bastain, Jack (Purchased OM version - thanks Bill!) 
 Stark, Dolly (Purchased OM version - thanks Bill!) 

1909-11 T206 - Waco (Southern League)  
 Thebo, Tony

1909-11 T206 - Shreveport (Southern League)  
 Smith, Carlos

Hi Joe,
E-mail sent re this nice T206 Thebo, PSA 3.5, with Piedmont back that I can sell.
Thanks,
--S
